title: Has anyone notice Evelynn's hair in the new/leaked splash art looks like . . .
body:
[The crest of the shadow isle? ](https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/1/11/Shadow_Isles_Crest.png/revision/latest?cb=20161117061207)


Lore wise she could be the thief that stole {{champion:82}}  remains ?
Could she be the Ruined King's wife who was saved at the end,but turned into demon like creature?
